channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: He broke the Bank of England — now he’s coming for America. How to bet with this trading legend using ETFs.
item.description: Stanley Druckenmiller’s bet against America’s debt is no ordinary trade.

item.title: My brother-in-law left $600K to a friend. He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD. Can my husband contest the will?
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: ‘I have a degree in economics’: I’m 70, earn $250K a year and have $3.7 million in investments. Is it time to retire?
item.description: “I have a home worth $1.3 million with $900,000 in equity. I have not paid it off as I have a 3% interest rate.”

item.title: Company insiders now are bearish to the extreme — but they’re upbeat on these 11 stocks
item.description: Overall, executives and directors are down on 10 S&P 500 sectors — and positive about just this one.

item.title: Nvidia and other stocks just became the most overbought names on Wall Street this week
item.description: Some stocks that have seen meaningful gains in recent days could be set to change course, a technical indicator shows.

item.title: These companies reporting next week have earnings momentum on their side
item.description: Companies reporting quarterly results next week that could see a post-earnings boost include General Motors and Charter Communications.

item.title: Buy these five stocks ahead of earnings, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Morgan Stanley says buy these five stocks heading into earnings.

item.title: Elliott has built a stake in Global Payments. How the activist can help the company lift its share price
item.description: Elliott Investment Management has a stake in Global Payments, and the news comes a few months after the payments processor made a big acquisition.

item.title: Strong start for earnings season creates support for Wall Street's record highs
item.description: Thus far, 83% of S&P 500 companies have beaten earnings expectations, according to FactSet's John Butters.
